data_table.description: Form 48 - Observational Study (OS) Follow-up Questionnaire (Year 1) -- current weight, recent weight change; current food and beverage consumption at meal or snack times, recent use of fats or oils, recent wine consumption; current smoking habits; recent history of hormone replacement; history of insecticide exposure; history of living with pets; history of computer use (frequency, duration); history of hand-held hair dryer use (frequency, duration).

variable.name: WEIGHT
variable.comment: What is your current weight? pounds

variable.name: WGTMAX1Y
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight? pounds

variable.name: WGTMIN1Y
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight? pounds

variable.name: LOST5LBP
variable.description: Lost >= 5 lbs on purpose past year
variable.comment: In the past year, did you lose five or more pounds on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWGTLCAL
variable.description: Lost weight using low calorie diet
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Low calorie diet. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTLFAT
variable.description: Lost weight using low fat diet
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Low fat diet. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTOTHD
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Other type of diet Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTSKP
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Skipped meals/fasted. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTALC
variable.description: Lost weight by decreasing alcohol intake
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Decreased alcohol intake Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTEX
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Increased exercise Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTPILL
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Diet pills Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTPRG
variable.description: Lost weight using a commercial program
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Commercial weight loss program Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTSURG
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Stomach surgery/intestinal bypass Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTSMK
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Started or increased smoking Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTOTH
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight (Mark all that apply.) Other Sub-question of F48 V2 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LOST5LBU
variable.description: Lost >= 5 lbs not on purpose past year
variable.comment: In the past year, did you lose five or more pounds not on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWGTILL
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Illness Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTSAD
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Depression Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTSTRS
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Stressful time Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTLE
variable.description: Lost weight due to life events
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Life events (e.g., change in job or marital status) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTOTHR
variable.description: Lost weight due to other reason
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Other Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWGTUKN
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Don't know Sub-question of F48 V2 Q5 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: BBRKFAST
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Before breakfast meal

variable.name: BRKFAST
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Breakfast

variable.name: BRKLUNCH
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Between breakfast and lunch

variable.name: LUNCH
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Lunch

variable.name: LUNDNNR
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Between lunch and dinner

variable.name: DINNER
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) Dinner

variable.name: AFTRDNNR
variable.comment: How many times per week do you usually eat the following meals or snacks? (Answer each question. If you do not usually eat the meal or snack, answer 'Never or less than once'.) After dinner

variable.name: FRYBTTR
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Butter

variable.name: FRYLOMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Low calorie margarine

variable.name: FRYSTMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Stick margarine

variable.name: FRYTBMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Tub margarine

variable.name: FRYVGFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Solid vegetable fat (e.g., Crisco)

variable.name: FRYSHORT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Shortening (lard, bacon fat drippings, salt pork or ham hock)

variable.name: FRYOLIVE
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Olive oil

variable.name: FRYCANOL
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Canola oil

variable.name: FRYPNUT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Peanut oil

variable.name: FRYVGOIL
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other vegetable oils (corn, safflower, sunflower)

variable.name: FRYSPRAY
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Non-stick spray (e.g., Pam)

variable.name: FRYOTFAT
variable.description: Fry/saute with other than listed fat
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other fat(s) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: FRYWOFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Did not use fat

variable.name: CKBTTR
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Butter

variable.name: CKLOMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Low calorie margarine

variable.name: CKSTMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Stick margarine

variable.name: CKTBMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Tub margarine

variable.name: CKVGFAT
variable.description: Cook veg/beans/rice with solid veg. fat
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Solid vegetable fat (e.g., Crisco)

variable.name: CKSHORT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Shortening (lard, bacon fat, drippings, salt p

variable.name: CKOLIVE
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Olive oil

variable.name: CKCANOL
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Canola oil

variable.name: CKPNUT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Peanut oil

variable.name: CKVGOIL
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other vegetable oils (corn, safflower, sunflower)

variable.name: CKSPRAY
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Non-stick spray (e.g., Pam)

variable.name: CKOTFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other fat(s) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: CKWOFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use when cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Did not use fat

variable.name: ADDBTTR
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Butter

variable.name: ADDLOMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Low calorie margarine

variable.name: ADDSTMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Stick margarine

variable.name: ADDTBMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Tub margarine

variable.name: ADDOLIVE
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Olive oil

variable.name: ADDCANOL
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Canola oil

variable.name: ADDPNUT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Peanut oil

variable.name: ADDVGOIL
variable.description: Add other veg. oil to veg/beans/rice
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other vegetable oils (corn, safflower, sunflower)

variable.name: ADDLSCR
variable.description: Add lo-fat sour cream to veg/beans/rice
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Non-fat or low-fat sour cream

variable.name: ADDRSCR
variable.description: Add regular sour cream to veg/beans/rice
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Regular sour cream

variable.name: ADDOTFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other fat(s) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ADDNOFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually add after cooking vegetables, potatoes, beans, or rice? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Did not use fat

variable.name: USEBTTR
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Butter

variable.name: USELOMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Low calorie margarine

variable.name: USESTMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Stick margarine

variable.name: USETBMRG
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Tub margarine

variable.name: USEOLIVE
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Olive oil

variable.name: USEOTFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Other fat(s) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: USENOFAT
variable.comment: In the past three months, what kinds of fat or oil did you usually use on breads, bagels, muffins, tortillas, and rolls? (Mark the one or two used most often. If you did not use fat, mark 'Did not use fat'.) Did not use fat

variable.name: REDWINE
variable.description: Glasses red wine drank past 3 m
variable.comment: In the past three months, how many glasses of RED wine did you drink? (Consider one glass as 6 ounces. Mark one.)
variable.value: None or less than 1 each month

variable.name: WHTWINE
variable.description: Glasses white/rose wine drank past 3 m
variable.comment: In the past three months, how many glasses of WHITE or ROSE wine did you drink? (Consider one glass as 6 ounces. Mark one.)
variable.value: None or less than 1 each month

variable.name: SMOKENW
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q13 'Do you smoke now'.

variable.name: CIGFILTR
variable.comment: Do you usually smoke filter tip or non-filter tip cigarettes? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q13 'Do you smoke now'.

variable.name: CIGTAR
variable.description: Type of tar and nicotine cigarette
variable.comment: Do you usually smoke regular or low tar and nicotine cigarettes (lites)? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q13 'Do you smoke now'.

variable.name: CIGSIZE
variable.comment: What size cigarettes do you usually smoke? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q13 'Do you smoke now'.

variable.name: HRTCMBP
variable.description: Combined HRT same pill past year
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescibed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill or package (for example Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: HRTCMBPM
variable.description: Combined HRT same pill months/past year
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use the COMBINED female hormone PILL which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q14 'Combined estrogen/progesterone'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTROGEN
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use the female hormone medication called ESTROGEN (for example, Premarin, Estrace, Ogen)? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream or gel.) (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen and progestin.) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_M
variable.comment:
In the past year how many months did you use any type of ESTROGEN? (Mark one. If you had shots, count each shot as one month.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_T
variable.description: Type of estrogen used the longest
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of ESTROGEN did you use the longest? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_P
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you take ESTROGEN pills (e.g., Premarin, Estrace, Ogen) by mouth? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_PD
variable.comment:
What was the average number of days each month that you used ESTROGEN pills? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15.3 'Used estrogen pills'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_PL
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of ESTROGEN pill did you use the longest? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15.3 'Used estrogen pills'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_DD
variable.description: Dose of estrogen pill taken each day
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15.3 'Used estrogen pills'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_SP
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you use ESTROGEN skin patches (for example, Estraderm, Climera)? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_SPD
variable.comment:
What dose skin patch did you usually use? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15.7 'Used estrogen skin patches'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: ESTR_SPN
variable.comment:
What was the average number of times each week that you changed your ESTROGEN skin patch? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15 'Used estrogen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q15.7 'Used estrogen skin patches'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROGEST
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use the female hormone medication called PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN (for example, Provera, Cycrin, Amen, Megace, or micronized progesterone)? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream or gel.) (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen and progestin.) Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROG_M
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN? (Mark one. If you had shots, count each shot as one month.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROG_T
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN did you use the longest? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROG_P
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you take PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pills by mouth? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROG_PD
variable.comment:
In the past year, what was the average number of days each month that you used PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pills? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16.3 'Progesterone by mouth'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROVERA
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you take Provera, Cycrin or Amen (MEDROXY PROGESTERONE-MPA) pills? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: PROVERAD
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16.5 'Provera in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: MICRPROG
variable.comment:
In the past year, did you take MICRONIZED PROGESTERONE pills? Sub-question of F48 V2 Q16 'Progesterone in past year'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 48.

variable.name: INSCT
variable.comment: Since age 21, have you or someone else ever poured, mixed, sprayed or applied insecticides (such as bug or flea spray, garden/lawn/crop insecticides) in your immediate surroundings at home, leisure, or work? (Do not include insect repellents, weed killers, fungus/mildew killers, or flea tick or mite treatments applied directly to pets.) (Mark one.)
variable.value: Yes, at home or leisure only
Yes, both at work and at home or leisure

variable.name: INSCTMIX
variable.comment: What types of exposure have you had to insecticides? (Mark all that apply.) I mixed them Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTAPP
variable.comment: What types of exposure have you had to insecticides? (Mark all that apply.) I sprayed or applied them Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTLS
variable.comment: What types of exposure have you had to insecticides? (Mark all that apply.) Lawn service applied them at my home Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTCS
variable.comment: What types of exposure have you had to insecticides? (Mark all that apply.) Applied in home by commercial service Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTOTH
variable.comment: What types of exposure have you had to insecticides? (Mark all that apply.) Other Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: FLEANON
variable.description: No method to treat pet for fleas
variable.comment: What methods have you used to treat your pets for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Do not include spraying the house for fleas or insects. Mark all that apply.) None. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTMXY
variable.comment: How many years in total did you personally mix or apply insecticides at home or at work? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTMXN
variable.comment: In those years, what was the average number of times each year that you personally mixed or applied insecticides at home or work? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.
variable.value: Never or less than once each year

variable.name: INSCTLSY
variable.comment: How many years in total did someone other than yourself (for example, a lawn service or a commercial applicator) apply insecticides to your home, lawn, or garden? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.

variable.name: INSCTLSN
variable.comment: In those years, what was the average number of times each year that someone other than yourself applied insecticides to your home, lawn or garden? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q17 'Insecticides since age 21'.
variable.value: Never or less than once each year

variable.name: COMPUTER
variable.comment: Have you ever sat in front of a computer screen within three feet with the power turned 'on' (for example, when writing letters)?

variable.name: COMPYR
variable.description: Years sat in front of computer
variable.comment: How many years in total did you sit in front of a computer screen regularly (at least once each week) with the power turned 'on'? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q18 'Sat 3 ft. from computer screen'.

variable.name: COMPDAY
variable.description: Sat in front of computer past 5 years, days/wk
variable.comment: In the past five years, what was the average number of days each week that you sat in front of a computer screen with the power turned 'on'? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q18 'Sat 3 ft. from computer screen'.

variable.name: COMPHRS
variable.description: Sat in front of computer, hours/day
variable.comment:
On the days that you used a computer, what was the average number of hours that you sat in front of a computer screen with the power turned 'on'? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q18 'Sat 3 ft. from computer screen'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q18.2 'Days per week sat at computer'.

variable.name: PET
variable.description: Lived with a pet in home
variable.comment: Since age 21, have you ever lived with a pet in your home?

variable.name: FLEACLLR
variable.description: Flea collar to treat pet for fleas
variable.comment:
What methods have you used to treat your pets for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Do not include spraying the house for fleas or insects. Mark all that apply.) Flea and tick collars. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19.1 #1 'Treat fleas/none' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: FLEAPWDR
variable.description: Powder to treat pet for fleas
variable.comment:
What methods have you used to treat your pets for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Do not include spraying the house for fleas or insects. Mark all that apply.) Powder or spray. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19.1 #1 'Treat fleas/none' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: FLEADIP
variable.description: Dips to treat pet for fleas
variable.comment:
What methods have you used to treat your pets for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Do not include spraying the house for fleas or insects. Mark all that apply.) Dips. Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19.1 #1 'Treat fleas/none' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: FLEAOTH
variable.description: Other method to treat pet for fleas
variable.comment:
What methods have you used to treat your pets for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Do not include spraying the house for fleas or insects. Mark all that apply.) Other Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19.1 #1 'Treat fleas/none' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: FLEAY
variable.comment:
How many years in total have you treated a pet in your home for fleas, mites, or ticks? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19 'Lived with pet since age 21'.
Sub-question of F48 V2 Q19.1 #1 'Treat fleas/none' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: HHDRY
variable.description: Hand-held hair dryer > once a wk
variable.comment: Have you ever used a hand-held hair dryer regularly (at least once a week)?

variable.name: HHDRYY
variable.comment: How many years in total have you used a hand-held hair dryer? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q20 'Ever used hand-held hair dryer'.

variable.name: HHDRYT
variable.comment: In those years, what was the average number of times per week that you used a hand-held hair dryer? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F48 V2 Q20 'Ever used hand-held hair dryer'.

variable.name: ELSTYR
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 6, 7, 7.1, and 7.2 Summary variable computed form hormone use questions collected on versions 1 and 2 of Form 48. See the data preparation section 5 for details.

variable.name: PLSTYR
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 8, and 8.1 Summary variable computed form hormone use questions collected on versions 1 and 2 of Form 48. See the data preparation section 5 for details.

variable.name: HLSTYR
variable.description: Hormone use in last year (estr or prog)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Estrogen use last year' and 'Progesterone use last year'. Summary variable computed form hormone use questions collected on versions 1 and 2 of Form 48. See the data preparation section 5 for details.
